news.title: Marten and Gordon guilty of gross negligence manslaughter of their baby
news.summary: Their newborn baby Victoria was found dead in an allotment shed in March 2023.

news.title: Nurse on first day among four dead in plane crash
news.summary: A Dutch pilot and co-pilot were also among the four people killed at London Southend Airport

news.title: BBC Gaza documentary narrated by Hamas official's son breached accuracy guideline, review finds
news.summary: BBC failed to disclose the narrator of Gaza: How to Survive a War Zone was the son of a Hamas official.

news.title: Gregg Wallace 'deeply sorry' after 45 claims against him upheld
news.summary: A report into BBC show MasterChef found 45 allegations against him were upheld.

news.title: First image of new Harry Potter released as filming begins for TV series
news.summary: Several new cast members have been announced, for roles including Dudley Dursley and Neville Longbottom.

news.title: Stokes inspires England to defeat stubborn India
news.summary: A fired-up Ben Stokes leads England to a stunning 22-run victory over a defiant India in a tense final day of the third Test at Lord's.

news.title: Thames Water issues hosepipe ban for one million people across four counties
news.summary: The water company says a lack of rain and increasing demand has stretched its supplies.

news.title: Man who murdered girlfriend and tried to cover up her death jailed for life
news.summary: The body of Phoenix Spencer-Horn, 21, was discovered at her home in East Kilbride in November 2024.

news.title: Boeing fuel switches are safe, aviation authority says after Air India crash
news.summary: A preliminary investigation found the switches had been turned off in June's fatal Air India crash.

news.title: German backpacker lost in outback 'beyond grateful' to be found
news.summary: Carolina Wilga says she survived for 11 days thanks to the "incredible" support from people searching for her.
